AbstractSimpleLoggerFactoryAdapter.CreateLogger Method

Create the specified logger instance

Overload List

Create the specified logger instance

protected override ILog CreateLogger(string)

Derived factories need to implement this method to create the actual logger instance.

protected abstract ILog CreateLogger(string,LogLevel,bool,bool,bool,string)
